mapper.select:
SELECT ch.CHID as chId , ch.CHNO as chNo , ch.CHNAME as chName , ch.CHOPENNAME as chOpenName , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HYCHANNELSCR cs WHERE cs.useYn = 'Y' AND cs.chId = ch.chId) as chUserCount , ch.REGDATE as regDate , ch.MODDATE as modDate , ch.USEYN as useYn FROM HYCHANNEL ch WHERE useYn = 'Y'
AND CHNAME LIKE '%' || #{chName} || '%'

SELECT CHID as chId , CHNO as chNo , CHNAME as chName , CHOPENNAME as chOpenName , CHUSERCOUNT as chUserCount , REGDATE as regDate , MODDATE as modDate , USEYN as useYn FROM HYCHANNEL WHERE CHID = #{chId}

SELECT CHID as chId , CHDEID as chDeId , CHDENO as chDeNo , CHNAME as chName , REGUSERID as regUserId , REGNICKNAME as regNickName , TITLE as title , CONTENT as content , NVL(INCHECK, 0) as inCheck , REGDATE as regDate , MODDATE as modDate , USEYN as useYn FROM HYCHANNELDE WHERE useYn = 'Y' AND CHID = #{chId} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(chDeNo) DESC

SELECT rownum, de.* FROM ( SELECT CHID as chId , CHDEID as chDeId , CHDENO as chDeNo , CHNAME as chName , REGUSERID as regUserId , REGNICKNAME as regNickName , TITLE as title , CONTENT as content , NVL(INCHECK, 0) as inCheck , REGDATE as regDate , MODDATE as modDate , USEYN as useYn FROM HYCHANNELDE WHERE useYn = 'Y' AND CHID = #{chId} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(chDeNo) DESC ) de WHERE rownum BETWEEN #{rownum} AND #{rownum}

SELECT CHID as chId , CHDEID as chDeId , CHDENO as chDeNo , CHNAME as chName , REGUSERID as regUserId , REGNICKNAME as regNickName , TITLE as title , CONTENT as content , INCHECK as inCheck , REGDATE as regDate , MODDATE as modDate , USEYN as useYn FROM HYCHANNELDE WHERE useYn = 'Y' AND CHDEID = #{chDeId}

SELECT cdc.chdeId as chdeId , cdc.chdeCommentId as chdeCommentId , cdc.regUserId as regUserId , cdc.regNickName as regNickName , cdc.deComment as deComment , cdc.commentLine as commentLine , cdc.regDate as regDate , cdc.modDate as modDate , us.profileImg as profileImg FROM HYCHANNELDECOMMENT cdc LEFT OUTER JOIN HYUSERS us ON cdc.REGUSERID = us.userId AND us.useYn = 'Y' WHERE cdc.useYn = 'Y' AND chdeId = #{chDeId} ORDER BY cdc.commentLine ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HYCHANNELDECOMMENT ( CHDEID , CHDECOMMENTID , REGUSERID , REGNICKNAME , DECOMMENT , COMMENTLINE , REGDATE , MODDATE , USEYN) VALUES ( #{chDeId}, reqSeqId('CHDECOM'), #{regUserId}, #{regNickName}, #{deComment}, #{commentLine}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '', 'Y')

INSERT INTO HYCHANNELDE ( CHID , CHDEID , CHDENO , CHNAME , REGUSERID , REGNICKNAME , TITLE , CONTENT , REGDATE , MODDATE , USEYN , INCHECK) VALUES ( #{chId} , reqSeqId('CHDE') , #{chNo} , #{chName} , #{regUserId} , #{regNickName} , #{title} , #{content} , to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '' , 'Y' , '')
mapper.update: UPDATE HYCHANNELDE SET inCheck = NVL2(inCheck, inCheck+1, 1) WHERE chDeId = #{chDeId} AND useYn = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) +1 as channelCount FROM HYCHANNEL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HYCHANNEL ( CHID , CHNO , CHNAME , CHOPENNAME , CHUSERCOUNT , REGDATE , MODDATE , USEYN) VALUES ( reqSeqId('CH') , #{channelCount} , #{chName} , #{chOpenName} , '0' , to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '' , 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT chId as chId , chDeId as chDeId , chDeNo as chDeNo , chName as chName , regUserId as regUserId , regNickName as regNickName , title as title , regDate as regDate , inCheck as inCheck FROM HYCHANNELDE WHERE regUserId = #{regUserId} ORDER BY chName, chDeno
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as subScrYn FROM HYCHANNELSCR WHERE useYn = 'Y' AND userId = #{userId} AND chId = #{chId}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO HYCHANNELSCR scr USING dual ON( scr.chId = #{chId} AND scr.userId = #{userId} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET scr.useYn = 'Y' , scr.modDate = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE scr.chId = #{chId} AND scr.userId = #{userId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CHID , CHIDNO , CHNAME , USERID , REGDATE , MODDATE , USEYN ) VALUES ( #{chId} , (SELECT NVL(COUNT(CHID), 0) + 1 FROM HYCHANNELSCR WHERE userId = #{userId}) , #{chName} , #{userId} , to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '' , 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT cs.chId as chId , ch.chName as chName , ch.chOpenName as chOpenName , ch.regDate as regDate , '채널 바로가기' as boardClick , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HYCHANNELSCR su WHERE su.useYn = 'Y' AND su.chId = ch.chId) as chUserCount FROM HYCHANNEL ch LEFT OUTER JOIN HYCHANNELSCR cs ON ch.chId = cs.chId AND ch.useYn = 'Y' WHERE cs.useYn = 'Y' AND cs.userId = #{userId}
